parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.60

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapons

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Turrets

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Initiates the loading action on given weapon of the turret of a transport. So the new magazine is not available instantly, yet according to the reloadTime.<br>
The turret has to be manned. One can also change the magazine if its respective weapon is not selected.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> transport [[loadMagazine]] [turretPath, weaponName, magazineName]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> transport: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> turretPath: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> weaponName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> magazineName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[loadMagazine]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[0], "m256", "20Rnd_120mmHE_M1A2"];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[magazinesTurret]], [[addMagazineTurret]], [[reload]], [[weaponState]], [[setWeaponReloadingTime]], [[weapons]], [[magazines]], [[Arma 3: Actions#SwitchMagazine|SwitchMagazine]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
